title: Cant Play League cause of this issue
body: So uum hey summoners i'd like to request help cause i've not played this game in a while maybe more than 4 months or so cause when i play league and only league the game instantly crashes and it appears it is popping bluescreen or something like that even though when it crashes its black nevermind i would like to know if you know how can i solve this problem it might be the laptop but it always played league of legends i dont know what is wrong with it and now im forced to play other games

replies.body: It honestly sounds like your client isn't connecting to the server properly! To work towards a fix, working through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should stabilize and get you back in the game.
